CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 25, 1954, pg. 1 reads: "Santa's Helpers - Pictured is a part of the committee who carried out the Courier project of helping needy families. Left to right they are George Pitts, June Acie, Jesse Harvey, Jean Farrish, John Franklin Galloway, Hannah Fletcher, Alma A. Polk and Margaret Amaker.  Others on the committee, but not in picture, are Hazel Garland, Lucille Johnson, Toki Schalk Johnson, Charles (Teenie) Harris, Beatrice Robinson, Lois Gaines, and Martin Brown.  Ralph E. Koger, assistant city editor, was coordinator. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, left to right: George Pitts, June Acie, Jesse Harvey, Jean Farrish, John Franklin Galloway, Hannah Fletcher, Alma A. Polk, and Margaret Amaker, standing with toys and food in Pittsburgh Courier offices
